title: High ping trouble
body:
Plz help me! I'm playing ranked at the moment and my first game was perfect. No high piing or whatever.

On my sencond game after that one, my ping go 40 to 500 in like 3secs and i don't know why.

This happen since the last patch.

Plz help.

replies.body: It sounds like a lag spike, maybe packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out what happened exactly.  Let me know what you find!

Yes i have run it and they said that but i don't know why that happened.

> Your average ping was 85 milliseconds.
> 
> The worst ping you experienced was 228ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.
> 
> Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 4.83%.
> 
> Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss.

Nerver had that with my first game of the day but only on my second.
Yesterday my lol client had take 75% of my cpu too without any reason too.

Thanks for the update!  It looks like packet loss to me, or some network issue that can't hold a strong connection to the game server.  I suggest going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection.  That should smooth things out!

Yes but that never happened before the new client! Is that the problem?

And NEVER with the first game
